content:
Located on Miami’s Ocean Drive this storied Art Deco Gem, a favorite of silver screen stars like Bogart and Hayworth has long been an oasis within the Miami scene. The Celino found a second life–and its current name–when we re-imagined it as a 132-room boutique hotel in 2019. With such glamourous and unique design features, this full service luxury property truly delivers. Relax and soak up the sun at our oasis garden pool while enjoying something from our exceptional food and beverage selection. Surrounded by a vibrant city and calming ocean vistas, the Celino is a seamless merger of historic Art Deco retrofit with a modern beachfront expansion. Offering a calm residential vibe, our boutique hotel blends tropical surroundings with modern décor and playful touches. Hey, the conga line was invented here after all. And yes, we can supply Conga drums....upon request of course.

The Celino provides guests with a full selection of hotel services and amenities. From our courtyard bar, in-room dining, fitness center to our concierge services, we'll make certain you have everything you need during your stay in Miami.

The Celino Hotel is ADA compliant under the Department of Justice ADA Title III Regulation 28 CFR Part 36, 1991. For information about accessible features, please view our Accessibility Statement .
